column4: hi! could you please point me to the right direction. Trying to establish a 3G connection via a Samsung GT-S7230 phone, which is connected via usb to microusb connector. In windoze theres a dialer which uses NDIS, however in ubuntu lsusb recognizes the phone, but im unable to establish a dialup connection via network manager
any hints on how to resolve this, much appreciated, i was thinking wvdial but not really sure?
could you please clarify what is nm?
